verbs.description: [ARG0: jcope] [V: reaches] [ARG1: settlement with top lobbyist over de blasio donation] top new york lobbyist james capalino has agreed to a 40 000 settlement with the state lobbying and ethics watchdog panel over his fundraising for a nonprofit set up by new york city mayor bill de blasio capalino settlement with the state joint commission on public ethics is the first fruit of its three - year investigation into the now - defunct lobbying nonprofit of de blasio a political rival of gov andrew cuomo who appoints six of the fourteen commissioners at jcope and where the top staffer is also a former cuomo counsel blasio wendy neu joe percoco laurence laufer seth agata de blasio jcope andrew cuomo joint commission on public ethics
